title: Scroll of curse weapon

{{flavour|This scroll places a curse on a wielded weapon.}}

Reading a '''scroll of curse weapon''' will [[curse]] your wielded [[weapon]]. They do not generate naturally, but [[Ashenzari]]-worshipers can produce them by [[pray]]ing over a [[scroll of remove curse]].

Cursing your weapon while worshipping [[Ashenzari]] allows you to receive the god's weapon skill boost and improves the rate at which you gain piety.

==History==
*In [[0.18]], Ashenzari's ability to create these scrolls was removed in favor of the more straightforward "curse item" ability.
*Prior to [[0.14]], scrolls of curse weapon would be naturally generated as loot, just like any other [[scroll]].
